title: Bugsplatting
body: Since patch 7.1 came out my game will not load. I know it says there's a problem with playing in full screen but my game bugsplats before i can even get into the loading screen, I hit try again and instantly back to bug splat. I have submitted over 40 reports of this and no one seems to be working on the problem. I know i'm not the only one experiencing this, its just really annoying to be completely unable to play. (I have also re-downloaded the game twice and nothing changed.) Any help would be much appreciated.

replies.body:
Bugsplats usually indicate that there's something up with either your System's Drivers or Hardware that's causing a poor interaction with League. I recommend going through the steps in our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to address the most common solutions for this.

If you still see issues after taking those steps, let me know!
